title: Canadian prime minister slams ‘authoritarianism’ in Russia, China
description: In a speech, Justin Trudeau called on 'like-minded democracies' to use economic incentives to combat authoritarianism.

title: Florida clears way for DeSantis to seek presidency while governor
description: US state passes bill that allows Governor Ron DeSantis to run for president without resigning from his current position.

title: Peru sends forces to Chile border where hundreds stranded
description: People seeking to leave Chile amid increase in restrictions have been stuck in extreme climate with few supplies.

title: How are Sudan’s resources linked to the conflict?
description: Sudanese people are suffering the consequences of all-out conflict between the army and a rival paramilitary force.

description: The fighting has reawakened a two-decade-old conflict in the western Darfur region where many have died this week.

description: Campaign messaging to become faster, more misleading as US enters 'uncharted territory' of advanced technology: Expert.

title: At least 25 killed in Russian air raids on Ukraine cities
description: The wave of Russian missile attacks was the first since early March.

title: First Republic stock rout worsens after receivership report
description: If the San Francisco-based lender falls into receivership, it would be the third US bank to collapse since March.

title: ChatGPT available to users in Italy a month after temporary ban
description: Maker Open AI and Italian authorities confirm that the chatbot is back online in the country.

title: Months after major storms, California braces for snow-fed floods
description: California farmers worry that melting snow could inundate them with a new round of flooding.

title: Brazil’s Lula resumes creation of Indigenous reservations
description: The president recognises six Indigenous reservations under policy halted by his predecessor Jair Bolsonaro.

title: US Fed plans broad revamp of bank oversight after SVB failure
description: Central bank says its oversight of Silicon Valley Bank proved inadequate and regulatory standards were low.

title: Israel shoot, kill teen in West Bank: Palestinian officials

description: Morgues and hospitals in city of Sfax are full, officials say, as the death toll from refugee shipwrecks soars.

title: Canada’s economy stumbles as GDP grows less than expected
description: Economy was nearly stagnant in February, is expected to contract in March on the back of the nation's largest strike.

title: Sudanese face ‘shocking’ delays, no aid at Egypt border
description: After perilous journey to the border, people escaping war wait for days without any aid before crossing into Egypt.

title: Turkey’s pro-Kurdish party backs Erdogan’s rival for president

description: Analysts say revival of loyalists of former ruler Omar al-Bashir could tilt balance of power in war between army and RSF

description: Richard Sharp, outgoing chair of national broadcaster, is a former Goldman Sachs banker and Conservative Party donor.

title: The states to watch in the fight for US abortion rights
description: After Roe v Wade repeal, states across the country continue to grapple with restricting or protecting abortion rights.

description: PM Mitsotakis will fight to keep leading the country, which is reeling from a rail crash and worries about the economy.

description: African leaders must not allow children to miss out on life-saving vaccinations.

title: Dire conditions, uncertain future for Sudanese refugees in Chad
description: Thousands have fled fighting and crossed into Chad, but aid agencies warn they do not have enough food to help them.

title: US Army helicopters crash in Alaska, killing 3 soldiers
description: The cause of the deadly crash is under investigation, the US military says.

title: Millions of Chinese welcome panda back home after stay in US

description: For many, switching from Russian to the Ukrainian language is an act of resistance.

description: President Recep Tayyip became ill during a TV interview with what was described as a 'gastrointestinal infection'.

title: Comprehensive sexuality education is the key to a better tomorrow
description: CSE empowers young people and adolescents to know their rights, make healthy choices, stay in school and flourish.

description: Dallia Abdelmoneim and her family knew they had to get out of Khartoum once their home was hit. Here's her story.

title: Ride the ‘Korean Wave’: The best shows to stream on Netflix

title: Attack on Burkina Faso military post kills at least 33 soldiers

title: Australia closes oldest coal plant in pivot to renewables

title: Taliban must ‘swiftly reverse’ crackdown on women’s rights: UN

title: Thousands rally in support of Israel’s divisive judicial overhaul
description: Divisive legislation to strip top court of its powers has fuelled weeks of mass protests by those who oppose it.
